summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of HiveMind Marketing website after design updates. All features working perfectly with new soft orange-to-white gradient background and DM Sans typography. Verified all navigation, forms, responsive design, and branding elements.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with soft orange-to-white gradient background (linear-gradient from #fff8f2 to #ffffff)
DM Sans typography correctly applied throughout the site (confirmed via computed styles)
Two CTA buttons ('For Brands' and 'For Creators') visible and functional
Logo carousel visible and animating with 16 placeholder brand logos
Navigation to /brands page works correctly via CTA button
Brands page displays hero image, 3 benefit cards, and form section
Form placeholder shows 'FORMLINKHERE' text as specified on both pages
Form submission displays success confirmation message on both pages
Back button navigates correctly from brands page to homepage
Navigation to /creators page works correctly via CTA button
Creators page displays hero image, 3 benefit cards, and form section
Header logo links back to homepage from all pages
Mobile responsive design - CTA buttons remain functional on mobile (390x844)
Mobile navigation works correctly for both brands and creators pages
Clean, minimal SaaS design with proper spacing and visual hierarchy
Consistent orange primary color (#f48d2d) used throughout design
Professional typography with DM Sans for both headings and body text
Smooth page transitions and animations working correctly
